data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Please consider making your page longer. Your ____ has ____ an ____ filter ____ it ____ like you're trying ____ create a very ____ new ____. Pages ____ are ____ short ____ properly ____ their ____ and ____ its ____ are ____ deleted. When you are ready, you may hit "Save page" again below to create this page.
data.partBlankContent: Please consider making your page longer. Your ed__ has trig_____ an auto_____ filter bec____ it lo___ like you're trying t_ create a very sh___ new pa__. Pages th__ are t__ short t_ properly iden____ their sub____ and exp____ its impor_____ are of___ deleted. When you are ready, you may hit "Save page" again below to create this page.
data.answer: 请考虑使您的页面更长。你的编辑已经触发了一个自动过滤器，因为它看起来像是你试图创建一个非常短的新页面。那些太短而无法正确识别子页面并表达其重要性的页面通常会被删除。当你准备好了，你可以再次点击下面的“保存页面”来创建这个页面。
